item.title: Beignets
item.description: Beignets # Ingredients # 1/2 tsp. dry yeast 1/4 cup warm water; 105Â°F 1/4 cup granulated sugar 2 Tbsp. vegetable shortening 1/2 tsp. salt 1/2 cup heavy cream 1 egg 4 cups all-purpose flour 1/2 cup boiling water Vegetable oil for frying Confectioner’s sugar for dusting Instructions # Sprinkle yeast over warm water in a small bowl, stirring to dissolve. Let stand for 5 minutes.
